t2.Target Weakness: Increases ATK by 15% and DEF Penetration by 120.
t2.Swift and Nimble: All Dodge +50 per second, up to 10 stacks; resets upon a successful dodge.
t2.Tactical Foresight: Increases All Dodge by 80 and reduces DMG taken by 8%.
t2.Opportune Strike: Increases Crit Chance by 185 and Crit DMG by 24%.
t2.Vital Detection: On attack, causes the target to take 8% increased All DMG and reduces ATK Speed by 8% for 10 sec. Activates once every 3 sec.
